alert.note: Alert for Washington (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 23 at 3:51PM EST until February 26 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Charleston WV has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Ohio... Muskingum River At Beverly affecting Washington County. For the Muskingum River...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING TO SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Muskingum River At Beverly. * WHEN...From Friday morning to Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 29.0 feet, Low areas, and farmland, camps, and a few homes are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:45 PM EST Wednesday the stage was 28.4 feet. - Forecast...The river will fall to 28 feet and begin rising again tomorrow evening. It will rise above flood stage Friday morning and continue to rise to 30.1 feet Friday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 29.9 feet on 02/07/2019. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/rlx. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 345 AM EST.
